properties.Name: Promotion
properties.Description: A planned activity or marketing activity to raise the visibility or increase sales of a product, service or concept.

Columns.Name: PromotionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Promotion.

Columns.Name: PromotionStartDate
Columns.Description: The start date of a Promotion.

Columns.Name: PromotionEndDate
Columns.Description: The end date of a Promotion.

Columns.Name: PromotionEligibilityStatement
Columns.Description: A statement that describes the eligibility to participate in the Promotion.

Columns.Name: PromotionRestrictionStatement
Columns.Description: A statement of the restrictions that apply to access to or participation in the Promotion.

Columns.Name: PromotionDiscountPercentage
Columns.Description: The percentage discount applied to a transaction in conjunction with the promotion.

Columns.Name: PromotionPerTransactionAmount
Columns.Description: The amount of discount per transaction applied in conjunction with the promotion.

Columns.Name: MaximumApplicableAmount
Columns.Description: The maximum amount of discount that may be applied to a transaction in conjunction with the promotion.

Columns.Name: MaximumAvailableAmount
Columns.Description: The maximum amount of discount that is available to the promotion.

Columns.Name: PromotionClassificationTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Promotion Classification Type.

Columns.Name: PromotionTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Promotion Type.

Columns.Name: PromotingPartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: MaximumUnitsAvailable
Columns.Description: The maximum number of units available to the promotion.

Columns.Name: FreeShippingIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates whether the promotion includes free shipping.

Columns.Name: ItemSku
Columns.Description: The Stock Keeping Unit identifier, which is typically used for inventory-related activities.

Columns.Name: ItemCost
Columns.Description: The cost associated with the item for the purpose of the promotion.
